argument.name: encode_string
argument.description: Non-null character string encoded with the BASE64ENCODE()function.

page.description: Decode (from string) binary data using BASE64.
page.discussion: BASE64DECODE() returns binary data decoded from a base-64 encoded character string of arbitrary length.
page.example: dim blob1 as B dim blob2 as B dim blob3 as B blob1 = "This is the time" blob2 = base64encode(blob1) blob2 -> "VGhpcyBpcyB0aGUgdGltZQA = " blob3 = base64decode(blob2) blob3 -> "This is the time"
